sponsor_weapons.name: Sword of the Morning Show
sponsor_weapons.description: A blade that sparkles under studio lights. Once per day, grants advantage on a performance check.

sponsor_weapons.name: Red Bull Battle Axe
sponsor_weapons.description: Gives you wings! On a critical hit, leap 10 feet in any direction.

sponsor_weapons.name: Pepsi-Cola Pike
sponsor_weapons.description: Foams on impact, dealing sticky psychic damage to enemies that hate sugar.

sponsor_weapons.name: Chainsaw of Chains
sponsor_weapons.description: Sponsored by an industrial tools manufacturer. Eats through armor like butter.

sponsor_weapons.name: Glowstick Dagger
sponsor_weapons.description: It breaks after 1d6 uses but looks amazing in the dark.

sponsor_weapons.name: Blimpie's Branding Iron
sponsor_weapons.description: Each hit leaves a tasty sandwich logo. Smells faintly of ham.

sponsor_weapons.name: The Golf Channel Driver
sponsor_weapons.description: Crushing skulls and handicaps at the same time.

dungeon_weapons.name: Rust Goblin Shiv
dungeon_weapons.description: Barely more than scrap metal, but effective if you stab someone enough times.

dungeon_weapons.name: Bone Club
dungeon_weapons.description: Carved from the femur of something big. Surprisingly sturdy.

dungeon_weapons.name: Iron Spike
dungeon_weapons.description: Common dungeon hardware repurposed into a stabbing tool.

dungeon_weapons.name: Ghoulfang Knife
dungeon_weapons.description: A jagged knife coated with a paralytic toxin.

dungeon_weapons.name: Torch-Club
dungeon_weapons.description: A makeshift torch strapped to a stick. Good light source, bad idea indoors.

dungeon_weapons.name: Ooze-Soaked Spear
dungeon_weapons.description: Tip permanently coated in dungeon slime, sizzling on impact.

dungeon_armor.name: Chainmail of Sighs
dungeon_armor.description: Each strike absorbed releases a ghostly sigh. Nobody sleeps well near it.

dungeon_armor.name: Leather of the Lost Scout
dungeon_armor.description: Supple leather that muffles footsteps. Smells faintly of pine and fear.

dungeon_armor.name: Slime-Crusted Shield
dungeon_armor.description: Any weapon that strikes it risks slipping free.

dungeon_armor.name: Helm of Echoes
dungeon_armor.description: Whispers past battles directly into your mind. Helpful, but maddening.

dungeon_armor.name: Cloak of Crawling Shadows
dungeon_armor.description: Shadows cling unnaturally to the wearer, making them hard to spot.

consumables.name: Potion of Too Much Energy
consumables.effect: Heal 1d6 HP but suffer disadvantage on stealth for 1 hour
consumables.description: Makes your heart race and your hands shake. Effective, but subtlety is gone.

consumables.name: Pickled Owlbear Egg
consumables.description: Smells awful, tastes worse, but you feel unstoppable afterwards.

consumables.name: Ale of Forgetfulness
consumables.effect: Removes fear and confusion, but you forget the last 24 hours
consumables.description: Bottoms up! Tomorrow, you won’t even remember the hangover.

consumables.name: Loaf of Hardtack
consumables.effect: Restores 1 HP, may break a tooth
consumables.description: It’s more rock than bread, but it keeps forever.

consumables.name: Elixir of Giggles
consumables.effect: Gain +2 morale for 1 hour but laugh uncontrollably at random
consumables.description: Popular with bards, hated by assassins.

tech_items.name: Viewer Drone
tech_items.effect: Hovering drone follows you, broadcasting your every move
tech_items.description: Loved by the audience, hated by party members who value privacy.

tech_items.name: Glitch Grenade
tech_items.effect: Explodes in a burst of static, stunning all creatures in 10 ft for 1 round
tech_items.description: The dungeon AI insists these are 'testing tools'. The crawlers disagree.

tech_items.name: AI Emergency Shield
tech_items.effect: Deploys automatically when HP falls below 25%, granting +4 AC for 1 minute
tech_items.description: The AI’s way of keeping its investment alive.

tech_items.name: Buzzsaw Gauntlet
tech_items.effect: Counts as a melee weapon, damage 2d6 slashing
tech_items.description: An unsafe but effective innovation in dungeon combat.

achievement_items.name: First Blood Trophy
achievement_items.effect: Reminds you of your first kill; +1 morale when equipped
achievement_items.description: A cheap plastic trophy, but it means the world to you.

achievement_items.name: Champion’s Laurel
achievement_items.effect: While worn, gain +2 to all charisma checks with commoners
achievement_items.description: A symbol of your glory. Crowds cheer when you walk by.

achievement_items.name: Golden Rat Medal
achievement_items.effect: +2 to checks involving traps or sneaking
achievement_items.description: Awarded for surviving the Rat King’s maze.

achievement_items.name: Crown of the Floor King
achievement_items.effect: Grants +2 to intimidation against dungeon creatures
achievement_items.description: Heavy is the head that clears the floor.
